messages.message: Anyone familiar with Map Records and its special behavior when doing splits by a custom formula? Found a possible bug wrt OCR information
When splitting by a custom formula (such that the document is split into two pieces), the second result is used as the resulting document, but the confidence from the first result is passed along

yes the way it handles OCR information is not correct at all; would you be able to help fix it? the code for it is here: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/py-utils/flow/server/src/py/instabase/flow/runnables/map_record_fns.py
and those functions are defined here: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/py-utils/data-api-utils/src/py/instabase/data_api_utils/_sheet/ibocr_fns.py
